ygData.subject: Re: Necro balancing (was negativity)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Interesting that you pick one of the few classes that didn t stage a sit in as they ultimate in whining. From my direct experience, Warriors were way less
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Feb 04/00, JasonF <JasonF@...> wrote:
>
> PS: IMO, the ultimate whiny brat fiasco was Warriors getting critical hits
> and naturaly increasing MR a few months back.

Interesting that you pick one of the few classes that didn't stage a sit
in as they ultimate in whining. From my direct experience, Warriors were
way less whiny than Druids and Necros were, most Warriors I started out
with back in March picked the more direct route of just not playing
Warriors any more (for real, not just threatened to)

Of the Warriors I was grouping with in March and April, most had either
quit or rolled up a different class by May. On Tarrew Marr, only 2 or
the 10 or so I knew in the fast leveling crowd actually stuck it out
until L50. The only other class I noticed had a high attrition in the
first wave of people to 50 were bards.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
